pullRequest.title: localization scripts (folder) optimization
pullRequest.bodyText:
fix #8050

add readme
fix: findmissintraslations does not work with languages whose abbreviation is longer than 2 characters
add as known false positives in readme (wont fix): findextratranslations finds 2 entries that are correct and therefore should not have been found

nodes.bodyText:
Suggestion for text:
These scripts are only relevant when unsure whether the crowdin translations are up to date.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,31 @@
+Checks for installed languages
+==============================
+
+These scripts are only relevant when unsure that the crowdin translations are not up-to-date.

@@ -0,0 +1,31 @@
+Checks for installed languages
+==============================
+
+These scripts are only relevant when unsure that the crowdin translations are not up-to-date.
+
+* findmissingtranslations.sh
+
+Search of missing translation strings in the language files other then english.

commit.message:
localization scripts (folder) optimization

fix #8050

- add readme
- fix: findmissintraslations does not work with languages whose abbreviation is longer than 2 characters
- add as known false positives in readme (wont fix): findextratranslations finds 2 entries that are correct and therefore should not have been found

afterCommit.message:
localization scripts (folder) optimization

fix #8050

- add readme
- fix: findmissintraslations does not work with languages whose abbreviation is longer than 2 characters
- add as known false positives in readme (wont fix): findextratranslations finds 2 entries that are correct and therefore should not have been found
